Pass the SALT | 2021 edition

The Free Software & Security CONFERENCE
July, 5 to 7 2021
Polytech school, Lille, France or VIRTUAL
depending of the COVID19 outbreak situation
¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Our Mission:
"Building bridges between Security communities and Free Software hackers!"

Timeline

  • February, 2021: opening of the Call for Papers
  • April 30, 2021: closing of the Call for Papers
  • May 15, 2021: notification sent to the speakers
  • May 30, 2021: publication of the program
  • June, 2021: opening of the booking interface
  • July 5 to 7, 2021 : the conference :-)

Content

> Talks


Talks will be about Free Software and Security. All the talks shall be given in English. The 2019 edition (last IRL edition) hosted 26 talks, grouped in 7 sessions.

> Workshops


2019 Pass the SALT hosted 9 workshops to discover new security free software projects. Network, theat intel and IAM. Come to discover and practice!

> Networking


Exchange experiences and create new relationships with attendees or speakers in a warm and open-minded ambiance.
